Text: You really need to stop this. First off it's Xvid now not XviD. AND Xvid is not a video format â€“ it is a program (codec) for compressing and decompressing to the MPEG-4 ASP format. Since Xvid uses MPEG-4 Advanced Simple Profile (ASP) compression, any video that is encoded with it is termed "MPEG-4 ASP video" â€“ not "Xvid video." Good day to you sir.
